  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class UpgradingScreen
extends SelectScreen
    Lets a plear Upgrade members from a Squad. Upgrading 1 level (100XP) should take 1 week and cost $50.
    See Also:
